Text.Page:
Things are getting out of hand! The {@LinkCreature:22#10#senior apprentices} tried to kill me!

These are no mewing children content with a flash and a pop. These young witches actually have some power.

There are too many to leave them in control of the halls. Stop them quickly or there'll be no cakes today.

Whomever is behind this nightmare will pay with pain most exquisite. It will take them months to die!

Your decisiveness is appreciated, . If everyone was in their right minds, they'd thank you.
